name: Galaxy Connector
description:
Galaxy Connector is a game where you must explore the asteroid belt you are trapped in, connect parts onto your ship to power it up and get to the nearest safe planet, while avoiding enemies and asteroids along the way. 

This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2021- Joined Together. Our game is about finding parts which join onto your ship, fitting the theme.

Controls-

WASD- Move

Q & E- Rotate player

Spacebar- Shoot

Hitting an obstacle will restart the level , so beware !!

Destroy enemy with missiles using spacebar.

Level completes when you find the "level complete" tag
